title: Pantones are Go(e)
content:
[Enough colours](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013160052/http:/www.pantone.com/pages/pantone/pantone.aspx?pg=20494&ca=10) to keep most people happy, until they have to buy the swatch set, the web 2.0/strawberry imac packaging has already received a panning, I’ve only seen the pictures shown online so I’ll hold judgement. Still [Kromofons](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013160052/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34122) might be able to get started on the full Unicode palette, don’t suppose he’ll calm down though. I’ll hang onto my Pantone swatches in the meantime.

Tim
author: timd

comments.content:
The Gods of Pantone have given birth to a new Pantheon of Lesser Gods (Goe Gods)... or have they just re-named the old Gods (like the Romans did with the Greeks)?

I'll stick to worshipping the lesser woodland sprites of CMYK, thank you.
